attributes.action: Make part time schooling (flexischooling) a real option for schools and families
attributes.background: Flexischooling is currently a legal option at the discretion of the headteacher. However, in reality schools are too afraid of going against the system to allow it. But not all children thrive in full time school; many families could benefit from an alternative.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

As you say in your petition, flexischooling is already available as an option. We're not sure exactly what further action you'd like to see.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
